column1: Easy Access to State and County Juvenile Court Case Counts
*Denotes case counts greater than zero and less than five.

column2: Data are either not available or are not reliable for publication.

column1: Mode: Automated data file (delinquency figures) and Annual Statistical Report, FY 2019 (dependency figures)
1. Delinquency figures are petitioned case filings.
2. Dependency figures are petitioned case filings for fiscal year 2019.
Suggested citation:Hockenberry, S., Smith, J., and Kang, W. (2021).
Easy Access to State and County Juvenile Court Case Counts, 2019. Online. Available: https://www.ojjdp.gov/ojstatbb/ezaco/.
